file_content.text: Heck of a thing you've got going.
What? You looking for a salute?
Then he demanded to look through my private locker. Like we're on an Imperial base or something. What a moron.
Hylo's more than a pretty face--she's a living legend.
If the military had been more like the Alliance, I might not have defected.
Payment better come on time or I'm out of here.
Left the cantina with creds to spare. Can't remember the last time that happened.
Now if only we had a casino....
Nice equipment, steady income, above par scenery... this is the good life.
Huh. So this is what "high morale" feels like.
